query:
SELECT 
                            number as "number: _"
                            ,hash as "hash: _"
                            ,transactions_root as "transactions_root: _"
                            ,gas as "gas: _"
                            ,logs_bloom as "bloom: _"
                            ,timestamp_in_secs as "timestamp_in_secs: _"
                        FROM blocks
                        WHERE hash = $1
